        <script>//<![CDATA[
jQuery(document).ready(function () {
  jQuery('form.ajax-add-to-cart').bind('logicspot_ajaxaddtocart_after', function (event, data) {});
  spinUp();
  function spinUp() {
    var spinUp = jQuery('.qty-control .up'),
      spinDown = jQuery('.qty-control .down'),
      qtyInput = jQuery('.qty-control input'),
      currentValue = qtyInput.attr('value');
    spinUp.click(function () {
      var newValue = currentValue * 1 + 1;
      qtyInput.attr('value', newValue);
      currentValue = newValue;
    });
    spinDown.click(function () {
      var newValue = currentValue * 1 - 1;
      if (newValue >= 1) {
        qtyInput.attr('value', newValue);
        currentValue = newValue;
      } else {
        currentValue = 1;
      }
    });
  }
  jQuery('#catalog-product-view-slider').slick({
    'dots': true,
    slidesToShow: 1,
    slidesToScroll: 1,
    arrows: false,
    centerMode: true,
    fade: true,
    asNavFor: '.catalog-product-view-slider-nav',
    responsive: [{
      breakpoint: 768,
      settings: {
        arrows: true
      }
    }, {
      breakpoint: 480,
      settings: {
        arrows: false
      }
    }]
  });
  jQuery('.catalog-product-view-slider-nav').slick({
    slidesToShow: 4,
    slidesToScroll: 1,
    asNavFor: '#catalog-product-view-slider',
    centerMode: true,
    focusOnSelect: true
  });
});
var productAddToCartForm = new VarienForm('product_addtocart_form');
productAddToCartForm.submit = function (button, url) {
  if (this.validator.validate()) {
    var form = this.form;
    var oldUrl = form.action;
    if (url) {
      form.action = url;
    }
    var e = null;
    //Start of our new ajax code
    if (!url) {
      url = jQuery('#product_addtocart_form').attr('action');
    }
    url = url.replace("checkout/cart", "ajax/index"); // New Code
    var data = jQuery('#product_addtocart_form').serialize();
    data += '&isAjax=1';

    // get current button value
    var buttonText = button.innerHTML;
    button.innerHTML = 'Adding...';
    button.disabled = true;
    try {
      str = decodeURIComponent(data);
      var arr = str.split('&');
      var obj = {};
      for (var i = 0; i < arr.length; i++) {
        var bits = arr[i].split('=');
        obj[bits[0]] = bits[1];
      }
      jQuery.ajax({
        url: url,
        dataType: 'json',
        type: 'post',
        data: data,
        success: function success(data) {
          var blockCart = jQuery('.block-cart'),
            miniCartLink = jQuery('.minicart-link'),
            countLink = jQuery('.minicart-link .count');
          if (blockCart) {
            blockCart.replaceWith(data.sidebar);
          }
          if (countLink) {
            countLink.html(data.items_qty);
          }
          miniCartLink.addClass('hover');
          button.innerHTML = 'Added';
          window.setTimeout(function () {
            button.innerHTML = buttonText;
            button.disabled = false;
            miniCartLink.removeClass('hover');
          }, 3000);
        }
      });
    } catch (e) {}
    //End of our new ajax code
    this.form.action = oldUrl;
    if (e) {
      throw e;
    }
  }
}.bind(productAddToCartForm);
productAddToCartForm.submitLight = function (button, url) {
  if (this.validator) {
    var nv = Validation.methods;
    delete Validation.methods['required-entry'];
    delete Validation.methods['validate-one-required'];
    delete Validation.methods['validate-one-required-by-name'];
    // Remove custom datetime validators
    for (var methodName in Validation.methods) {
      if (methodName.match(/^validate-datetime-.*/i)) {
        delete Validation.methods[methodName];
      }
    }
    if (this.validator.validate()) {
      if (url) {
        this.form.action = url;
      }
      this.form.submit();
    }
    Object.extend(Validation.methods, nv);
  }
}.bind(productAddToCartForm);
//]]></script>
